title: Funko POP TV: Hannibal - Hannibal Lecter Figure
description: From the hit NBC psychological thriller-horror TV series, Hannibal, comes this Hannibal Lector Pop! Vinyl Figure! This 3 3/4-inch tall Hannibal Lector Pop! Vinyl Figure features the stylized likeness of actor, Mads Michelson as Dr. Hannibal Lector . Hannibal Lector comes in a window box and makes a great gift for any fan of the Hannibal TV show!

title: The Art and Making of Hannibal: The Television Series
Funko POP TV: Hannibal - Wendigo
description: The dark Stag Man looks as creepy as ever. Wendigo comes in a window box and makes a great gift for any fan of the Hannibal TV show.

title: Funko POP TV: Hannibal - Will Graham
description: From the hit NBC psychological thriller-horror TV series, Hannibal, comes this Will Graham Pop! Vinyl Figure! This 3 3/4-inch tall Will Graham Pop! Vinyl Figure features the stylized likeness of actor, Hugh Dancy as Will Graham. Will Graham comes in a window box and makes a great gift for any fan of the Hannibal TV show!

title: This Is My Design Glasses Case
description: The case is painted by hand with acrylic paint, and is covered with a protective layer of acrylic lacquer on the top. If the cover is dirty, just wipe with a damp cloth. He looks bright and out of the ordinary, involuntarily attracts the eyes of others (whether you like it or not ^_^).

title: Hannibal Buttons
description: Swiggity swag, we're celebrating the delicious Hannibal and the wendigo stag with a set of three buttons (1 pack) featuring original designs from the TV series starring Mads Mikkelsen and Hugh Dancy.
